title: 114_hr5045
content: Preserving Access to Modern Prosthetic Limbs Act of 2016 This bill amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to postpone implementation and enforcement ofnbsp. A local coverage determination (LCD) proposed by a Medicare Administrative Contractor (MAC) on lower limb prostheses. The Centers for Medicare amp. Medicaid shall provide guidance and oversight related to LCDs, as specified by the bill.
